comments: If n is prime, a(n) = 2 since a(p) = (tau(p^4)+3)/4 = (5+3)/4 = 2. - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Nov 16 2013
maple: A015996 := proc(n)        (numtheory[tau](n^4)+3)/4 ;end proc; # _R. J. Mathar_, May 09 2013
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_
extensions: Definition corrected by Vladeta Jovovic, Sep 03 2005
